body:
Thanks Raphael and Jan,


I assume Meteonorm would be the best source of information for these kind
of cases. However; is that data representative enough to use it for design
just as if it were a measured data? Should we take anything special into
account?


THANKS!




2014-06-20 10:42 GMT-04:00 Wienold Jan <jan.wienold at epfl.ch>:
